entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `last_update` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, `_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `version` INTEGER NOT NULL, `valid_time_start` TEXT NOT NULL, `valid_time_end` TEXT NOT NULL, `transaction_time_start` TEXT NOT NULL, `transaction_time_end` TEXT NOT NULL, `initiates` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`_id`, `version`, `transaction_time_start`))

indices.name: location_current
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `location_current` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`_id`, `valid_time_start`, `valid_time_end`)

indices.name: location_pkey
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `location_pkey` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`_id`)

indices.name: location_transaction_time_start
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `location_transaction_time_start` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`transaction_time_start`)

indices.name: location_transaction_time_end
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `location_transaction_time_end` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`transaction_time_end`)

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select * from location where valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < valid_time_end and transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999'

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'd098a783f1161408f1a90c75c24d904a')
